spots.name: Elephant Nature Park
spots.description: Ethical elephant sanctuary where you can feed, walk with, and bathe rescued elephants. Full day trip includes lunch and hotel pickup. Book at least 1 day in advance.
spots.address: 209/2 Sridom Chai Road, Mae Rim, Chiang Mai

spots.name: Thai Cooking Class
spots.description: Learn to cook authentic Thai dishes! Start with a market tour to pick fresh ingredients, then cook 5 dishes including pad thai, curry, and mango sticky rice. Classes daily at 9am and 2pm.
spots.address: Somphet Market, Moon Muang Road Soi 6, Old City

spots.name: Game Night
spots.description: Join us every evening for board games, card games, and drinks! We have over 50 games including Catan, Uno, Exploding Kittens, and more. Free to play, just buy your drinks.
